name: Rainbow Land - A journey out of depression
name_original: Rainbow Land - A journey out of depression
description:
PLEASE PRESS E TO TALK TO THE TURTLE MAN / FROG MAN!!

Story:
The man being played is a depressed man. The colors are therefore taken from his life and this is reflected in the game being played. The story is about him overcoming his depression, manifested in bosses, and after every boss he will regain one color to his life and world view. For example, spoiler: The first boss is his bed - symbolizing the first step getting out of depression is getting out of bed. This theme is consistent through out the game. Enjoy!

Browser keybinds are not disabled. Beware when using CTRL! It is recommended for mouse & keyboard users to use mouse click to shoot to avoid pressing browser keybinds! CTRL + W WILL CLOSE YOUR WINDOW IN GOOGLE CHROME.
